meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gay Mollette David Itkin Harry Barker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2822.

td.p: Gay Mollette, a procurement manager originally from Detroit, Michigan
David Itkin, an attorney originally from Rochester, New York
Harry Barker, a computer applications specialist originally from Bloomington, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,399)

tr.td: FAMOUS GABYs
DECEMBER
DANCE
PERILS
MEXICO
ODDS & ENDS
